      • eventReceived

        public boolean eventReceived​(IBlockState state,
                             World worldIn,
                             BlockPos pos,
                             int id,
                             int param)
        已过时。
        call via IBlockBehaviors.onBlockEventReceived(World,BlockPos,int,int) whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
        Called on server when World#addBlockEvent is called. If server returns true, then also called on the client. On the Server, this may perform additional changes to the world, like pistons replacing the block with an extended base. On the client, the update may involve replacing tile entities or effects such as sounds or particles
        覆盖:
        eventReceived 在类中 Block

      • createNewTileEntity

        public TileEntity createNewTileEntity​(World worldIn,
                                      int meta)
        Returns a new instance of a block's tile entity class. Called on placing the block.
        指定者:
        createNewTileEntity 在接口中 ITileEntityProvider

      • withRotation

        public IBlockState withRotation​(IBlockState state,
                                Rotation rot)
        已过时。
        call via IBlockProperties.withRotation(Rotation) whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
        Returns the blockstate with the given rotation from the passed blockstate. If inapplicable, returns the passed blockstate.
        覆盖:

                              Mirror mirrorIn)
        已过时。
        call via IBlockProperties.withMirror(Mirror) whenever possible. Implementing/overriding is fine.
        Returns the blockstate with the given mirror of the passed blockstate. If inapplicable, returns the passed blockstate.

        pos - Block position in world

      • getWeakChanges

        public boolean getWeakChanges​(IBlockAccess world,
                              BlockPos pos)
        从类复制的说明: Block
        If this block should be notified of weak changes. Weak changes are changes 1 block away through a solid block. Similar to comparators.
        覆盖:
        getWeakChanges 在类中 Block
        参数:
        world - The current world
        pos - Block position in world
        返回:
        true To be notified of changes
